Cheating! Beware of Order Issues! Double-Check Before You Leave!
I ordered chicken wings and a triple cheeseburger (as shown in the attached photo), but I received chicken nuggets and a chicken burger instead. My Prosperity beef burger isnâ€™t not double as you can also see on that photo! Not only was my order completely wrong, but the items I got are also cheaper than what I paid for. This is unacceptable. I do NOT recommend this place! I hope that management will take serious actions because it seems like it happened not only with me! The whole order isnâ€™t correct!

Reasonable service and food standard but it is super crowded even around 9am on a Saturday morning. Be prepared to wait for tables. Environment too busy for my likely. Especially for a peaceful weekend breakfast.

The food prepared is very fresh. I ordered filet o fish, nuggets and fries

Messed up our order and we only found out when we got home with our take away. Instead of my triple cheeseburger we got a terrible mcchicken. Careless and ignorant staff. See the photos.
